name: spotify-auto-pause
description: Spotify Auto-Pause Application - Automatycznie pauzuje Spotify gdy wykryje inne dźwięki
author: Avatar

scripts.install:all: npm run install:frontend && npm run install:backend
scripts.build:backend: cd backend && dotnet publish -c Release -o bin/Release/net8.0/publish
scripts.build: npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend
scripts.dist: npm run build && cd frontend && npm run build:electron
scripts.clean: cd frontend && npm run clean && cd ../backend && dotnet clean
scripts.test: npm run test:backend && npm run test:frontend
